Delivery and payment methods
You can choose whether your products are delivered to a post office or to your door, and now Posti’s parcel points are also available as an option. If you would like delivery to your door, please provide your telephone number with your order so that Posti can arrange a delivery time. If you wish your products to be delivered to a parcel point, please remember to give your mobile phone number so that you can receive a delivery alert by text message.
If you so wish, we are able to deliver gifts directly to the recipient. If you select home delivery as your delivery method, please give the recipient’s telephone number so that Posti can arrange a delivery time.
If the products that you order are in stock, the estimated delivery time is 2–5 business days. If a product is temporarily out of stock, we will e-mail you to notify you of the delay.
We will deliver your order to your home address. If your order involves customs or other issues concerning local taxes, we will contact you before the order is delivered. Please make sure that your contact details are correct.
Returns
You can inspect the products you have ordered from Aarikka for 14 days after receiving them and decide whether you want to keep them. If the product does not meet your expectations, you can return it or exchange it for another product within 14 days. We require the product to be unused and in its original condition. Products must always be returned in their original packaging.
